name: Pranksterz: No Rest for the Wicked
name_original: Pranksterz: No Rest for the Wicked
description:
Pranksterz: No Rest for the Wicked is an arcade game developed by VZlab. It was originally released in 2007. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Pranksterz: No Rest for the Wicked is available on PC.
